Rising Hopes

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, ardent, ardent surge power, Mantle of Clarity class feature
Benefit: When you target a dying ally with your ardent surge, the target can stand up and shift 1 square as a free action.


Update (8/16/2011)
Changed in September update.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 138.
